rxivistr 0.1.0

rxivist_stats

Source: R/rxivistr.R
rxivist_stats.Rd

Returns statistics on number of articles indexed by rxivist.

rxivist_stats()

Value

Returns a list with rxivist stats.

Examples

rxivist_stats()
#> $papers_indexed
#> [1] 94912
#> 
#> $authors_indexed
#> [1] 404161
#> 
#> $missing_abstract
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $missing_date
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $outdated_count
#> $outdated_count$`animal-behavior-and-cognition`
#> [1] 1134
#> 
#> $outdated_count$biochemistry
#> [1] 2275
#> 
#> $outdated_count$bioengineering
#> [1] 1553
#> 
#> $outdated_count$bioinformatics
#> [1] 5505
#> 
#> $outdated_count$biophysics
#> [1] 2581
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`cancer-biology`
#> [1] 2436
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`cell-biology`
#> [1] 2712
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`clinical-trials`
#> [1] 91
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`developmental-biology`
#> [1] 2164
#> 
#> $outdated_count$ecology
#> [1] 2626
#> 
#> $outdated_count$epidemiology
#> [1] 1347
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`evolutionary-biology`
#> [1] 2648
#> 
#> $outdated_count$genetics
#> [1] 2033
#> 
#> $outdated_count$genomics
#> [1] 2875
#> 
#> $outdated_count$immunology
#> [1] 1790
#> 
#> $outdated_count$microbiology
#> [1] 4948
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`molecular-biology`
#> [1] 1802
#> 
#> $outdated_count$neuroscience
#> [1] 10162
#> 
#> $outdated_count$paleontology
#> [1] 98
#> 
#> $outdated_count$pathology
#> [1] 382
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`pharmacology-and-toxicology`
#> [1] 653
#> 
#> $outdated_count$physiology
#> [1] 929
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`plant-biology`
#> [1] 1492
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`scientific-communication-and-education`
#> [1] 469
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`synthetic-biology`
#> [1] 682
#> 
#> $outdated_count$`systems-biology`
#> [1] 1307
#> 
#> $outdated_count$zoology
#> [1] 377
#> 
#> $outdated_count$null
#> [1] 22
#> 
#> 
#> $missing_authors
#> [1] 63
#> 
#> $missing_category
#> [1] 50
#> 
#> $authors_no_papers
#> [1] 23
#>
